text: Penicillium nordicum is an anamorph species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which produces ochratoxin A.UniProtATCC Penicillium nordicum contaminates protein rich foods and foods with high NaCl-konzentration. It is mostly found on dry-cured meat products and cheese products == Further reading == * * * * * * * * == References == nordicum Category:Fungi described in 1985
title: Penicillium nordicum
